content: gorgeous fast and fun crochet plaid pumpkin to make take your fall decor up to a whole new level with this fun plaid pumpkin pattern a joy to crochet and to use in your decor carry unused colors as you go for easy finishing this beautiful pumpkin also makes a great gift skill level advanced > please note that this pattern is > available for free on my blog here 1 > the benefit of purchasing this pdf is > an easy to read printable and > ad-free version of the pattern materials needed * worsted weight yarn * crochet hook size g 4 00 mm * tapestry needle for weaving in ends & assembly * fiberfill finished pumpkin is 4 5 wide x 4 25 tall pattern will be available for instant download upon payment the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of crochet 365 knit too this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase 1 https //www crochet365knittoo com/crochet-plaid-pumpkin/
